enhanced_info.title: French Speaking SEO Content Writer
enhanced_info.description:
RemotePermanent or Full-time ContractorCompetitive package

About Us

ClickOut Media is not just a company - it's a thriving ecosystem of diverse talent from around the globe. As a proudly remote-first organisation, we've cultivated an environment where creativity flourishes, collaboration is core, and innovation knows no bounds. With over +850 team members and more than 200 assets, our startup culture fuels our growth, making us a leading force in multi-channel marketing. We specialise in delivering best-in-class SEO & Content solutions to esteemed clients worldwide.

What Makes Us Different

At ClickOut Media, we thrive in the most competitive search verticals, operate across every major language, and conquer platforms you've probably never even heard of. Our dynamic approach, combined with our fast-paced environment, sets us apart in the industry. We're not just here to meet expectations; we're here to exceed them, every single time. Our relentless pursuit of excellence has been the cornerstone of our continuous success.

Job Description

We are excited to be on the hunt for a talented and motivated individual to join our team as a French Speaking SEO Writer.

Responsibilities

Write high-quality content for our iGaming projects, primarily focused on online casinos and sports betting for the French marketCreates high-quality and engaging content, aligning with detailed briefsImplements SEO recommendations to enhance content visibilityEnsures content compliance with market trends and regulationsAdheres to the editorial calendar, meeting deadlines consistently

Qualifications

Minimum 2 years of experience in content writing or copywriting, ideally in the iGaming fieldKnowledge of French market regulations regarding online gambling (ANJ, legislation, etc.)Excellent written and spoken skills in English and FrenchPrior experience with iGaming affiliate platformsProficiency in SEO tools (such as Semrush, Ahrefs, SurferSEO, etc.)Basic HTML/CSS knowledge to improve layout in WordPressA sense of storytelling and the ability to adapt the tone to suit the target audience (informal, expert, marketing, etc.)

Benefits & Rewards

A brilliant opportunity to grow your career & work with a fun, fast-paced & growing company, prepared to let you shineAn entrepreneurial environment where you learn more every day (we more than welcome and support people with their own projects)Build an organization that continues to diversify its portfolioPersonal responsibility with a ton of autonomy33 free paid daysAn international team with over 35 nationalitiesFully Remote working Additional benefits for permanent employees are available depending on the location

What do we mean by "Fully Remote"

Clickout Media offers you an unparalleled working experience. We are registered in Malta, but you don't have to be. Wherever you are based, and whether you are employed, operate B2B, or are a career freelancer, we will always find a way to work with great people.

Engaging with a worldwide workforce, ClickOut Media brings together world-leading experts in the fields of Tech, SEO, Content, and Product. Our remote approach gives absolute flexibility to our people and exemplifies our philosophy of autonomy and trust.

Diversity is a given to us, and this unique approach allows us to deliver and have respect for the wide variety of people, experiences, and cultures we bring together.

Our Recruitment Process Is As Follows

ApplyHave an introduction call with our recruitment teamDo a testHave a technical interview

Equal Opportunities

ClickOut Media is an equal-opportunity employer welcoming applicants from all backgrounds.

enhanced_info.description:
Description Du Poste

Overview :

On ne cherche pas un simple media buyer junior ‚Äì on cherche le bras droit d'un des meilleurs talents Growth d'Europe. Apr√®s 8 ans d‚Äôexp√©rience aux √âtats-Unis et 50 millions d‚Äôeuros d√©pens√©s en publicit√©s, on a d√©velopp√© un playbook unique pour scaler des marques DTC.

Quelques r√©sultats r√©cents :

 De 100K‚Ç¨ √† 1.9M‚Ç¨ par mois en 90 jours  De 10K‚Ç¨ √† 800K‚Ç¨ par mois en 9 mois  De 200K‚Ç¨ √† 600K‚Ç¨ en 6 mois 

Pourquoi on a besoin de toi :

REACH se d√©veloppe rapidement et le volume de projets strat√©giques augmente fortement (CRO, CRM, BFCM, nouveaux lancements). On cherche un Analyste Acquisition & Growth capable de soutenir le Head of Growth sur deux axes :

 Ex√©cution & analyse paid media (Meta Ads, reporting, BP/P&L).  Organisation & suivi op√©rationnel (r√©tro-planning, coordination inter-√©quipes, relances clients). 

Tu travailleras en direct avec Jordan, notre Head of Growth, qui a plus de 7 ans d'exp√©rience en e-commerce et qui est responsable des performances exceptionnelles sur toutes les marques du portefeuille. C‚Äôest l‚Äôopportunit√© d‚Äô√™tre au c≈ìur de la strat√©gie growth et de contribuer √† la r√©ussite des marques DTC les plus ambitieuses.

Tes missions :

 Ex√©cuter et optimiser des campagnes Meta Ads (mises en place des campagnes, budgets, audiences, reporting).  Sortir, analyser et exploiter des exports Business Manager (CPA, ROAS, LTV, MER).  Faciliter la construction des BP & P&L marketing pour le compte du Head of Growth.  Prendre ownership absolu des r√©tro-plannings pour les projets (CRO, CRM, campagnes sp√©ciales).  Sourcer, booker, et coordonner nos agences partenaires (CRO, CRM, etc.) et suivre leurs livrables.  R√©cup√©rer et int√©grer les inputs clients (P&L, assets, informations cl√©s) dans le temps impartis.  Assurer la coordination avec les p√¥les internes (CRM, data, ops, cr√©a) pour livrer √† temps. 

Profil recherch√© :

 1 √† 3 ans d‚Äôexp√©rience en acquisition digitale (Meta Ads) en agence ou chez l'annonceur.  Solide ma√Ætrise de Google Sheets/Excel (index, pivot, lookups, mod√©lisation simple).  Ultra-organis√©, rigoureux, capable de suivre plusieurs projets en parall√®le.  Excellente communication, fran√ßais impeccable, anglais professionnel.  Connaissance des fondamentaux e-commerce / DTC (CAC, AOV, LTV, CR, MER). 

R√©mun√©ration :

 Fixe : 40 000 ‚Ç¨ ‚Äì 50 000 ‚Ç¨ par an (selon profil).  Variable : 5 000 ‚Ç¨ ‚Äì 10 000 ‚Ç¨ par an (index√© sur les r√©sultats et la qualit√© d‚Äôex√©cution). 

La r√©mun√©ration est ajustable en fonction du profil.

Ce r√¥le est pour toi si :

 Tu sais auditer un export Meta et proposer des actions concr√®tes.  Tu sais construire des BP √† partir d'exports bruts et suivre les √©carts r√©el vs pr√©vision.  Tu es direct, transparent, no-bullshit.  Tu veux voir l‚Äôimpact direct de ton travail sur la croissance des marques.  Tu incarnes la culture REACH : performance, transparence, et humain. 

Opportunit√©s de d√©veloppement :

REACH acc√©l√®re fortement et ce r√¥le peut rapidement √©voluer :

 Devenir Growth Strategist avec la gestion directe de comptes strat√©giques. Manager √† terme une √©quipe de 5+ personnes Prendre des responsabilit√©s dans Reach Ventures (holding M&A) pour contribuer √† le growth de nouvelles marques DTC (horizon 2026). 

√âtapes de recrutement :

 Entretien vid√©o via Workable pour avoir plus d‚Äôinformations sur ton parcours et ton profil. Appel de 30 minutes avec Anne-Ga√´lle (Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist) afin de valider les attentes.Appel de 1 heure avec Jordan (Head of Growth) afin de tester tes comp√©tences techniques avec un cas pratique, et valider un fit humain. Entretien de 30 minutes avec Alessandro (CEO), pour discuter de ton background, tes ambitions et r√©pondre √† tes questions. Caf√© avec Jordan (Head of Growth) et Alessandro (CEO) pour valider le fit final et cadrer la collaboration.

enhanced_info.title: Global Public Affairs Director
enhanced_info.description:
Welcome diversity and apply as you are!At Adisseo, we cherish the value of diversity whatever it may be.
This role is pivotal in shaping Adisseo‚Äôs external engagement with regulatory bodies, industry associations, political stakeholders, and media, particularly in the feed, agriculture, and agribusiness sectors. You will ensure Adisseo‚Äôs voice is influential in shaping policy, securing regulatory approvals, getting support from authorities on new product launches & subsidies for new capacities & improvement projects and enhancing the company‚Äôs reputation as a global leader in sustainable animal nutrition.
The responsibility primarily covers Europe and includes coordination with the rest of the world and communication / sharing of best practice with China.

Key responsibilities:
Regulatory and Institutional EngagementBuild and maintain strategic relationships with EU institutions and national ministries (Agriculture, Industry, Environment), with a specific focus on France and Spain. Monitor and influence regulatory developments affecting feed additives, trade, and sustainability.Coordinate lobbying efforts to support antidumping measures, trade protections, and favorable regulatory frameworks.
Strategic Public AffairsDevelop and implement a comprehensive public affairs strategy aligned with Adisseo‚Äôs business goals. Map and cultivate relationships with key political and administrative stakeholders across Europe.
Corporate Representation and AdvocacyPosition Adisseo as a reference partner in competitiveness clusters and international forums. Ensure Adisseo is represented in key institutions and contributes to thought leadership through publications and media presence.
Internal Coordination and Capacity BuildingBuild and lead a high-performing PR and lobbying team, including external consultants and internal stakeholders.Train senior leaders and key personnel on public affairs engagement and advocacy.
Business, Operations & R&I Support and Subsidy StrategyDesign and lead a comprehensive subsidy acquisition strategy to support Adisseo‚Äôs major capital expenditure, screen and monitor public funding opportunities at the EU and support plant & operations management in establishing & maintaining regular contacts with local authorities for proactive & crisis management of local events.Coordinate internal stakeholders to align project goals with funding priorities and ensure timely preparation of high-quality applications.

Qualifications:
Lobbying Expertise: Proven experience in policy influence and institutional relationsCollaborative Spirit: Skilled at building internal and external networksCommunication: Clear, persuasive communicator across diverse audiencesRegulatory Knowledge: Deep understanding of EU policy and agribusiness dynamicsLeadership: Experience managing teams and external consultantsStrategic Thinking: Ability to align public affairs with business goalsLanguages: Fluent in English and professional-level French; other EU languages are a plus

enhanced_info.description:
Paris Office

At EF Language Abroad, we believe that the world is better when people try to understand one another. Since 1965, we've helped millions of students discover new places, embrace diverse cultures, and gain fresh perspectives.

We offer immersive short-term and long-term language courses and programs across different languages in the countries where they‚Äôre spoken. Together, our global staff help students from around the world develop the language skills they need to achieve their dreams.

Are you ready for a dynamic role in a truly international environment? Are you passionate about digital marketing and strongly goal-oriented?

As the Head of Marketing you will be at the heart of our mission to connect with more learners, working in a dynamic atmosphere while shaping our digital future.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to:

Unleash your creativityAnalyze dataDesign targeted campaigns

The everyday working language in our Paris office is French, however, this role requires excellent command of the English language as well to communicate with Global Leaders and Stakeholders. Full fluency (speaking, reading, writing) in both languages is required. Please submit your CV in English. CVs in French will not be considered. 

Your key responsibilities will include: 

You will drive a high-performing marketing team and own the marketing strategy, balancing performance marketing, brand storytelling, and offline activation to drive demand and revenue growth.

Manage a team of 10+ marketers, fostering a culture of growth, creativity, performance, and data-driven decision-makingDevelop and execute innovative digital strategies to enhance brand awareness and engage our audience in new ways.Manage paid campaigns, SEO/SEM, email marketing, and social media to turn traffic into leads and followers into brand ambassadors.Work closely with product, sales, and global marketing teams to align your vision with our objectives.Use data to measure performance, refine strategies, and exceed expectations.Ensure our content and messaging resonate with the local audience while maintaining the brand‚Äôs global identity.Oversee marketing budgets, ensuring optimal allocation of resources.Collaborate with agencies, media, and influencers to expand our reach.Stay ahead of market trends, customer feedback, and competitor actions.Organize events, webinars, and sponsorships to bring the EF brand to life.Define and execute a full-funnel marketing strategy that combines performance marketing, brand building, and offline activations to drive business growth.Own the lead generation and customer acquisition strategy, ensuring an optimal marketing mix across paid digital, organic, brand, and partnerships.

What we are looking for: 

5-10 years of experience in marketing, both digital and offlineMinimum 5 years of experience leading a teamPassionate about marketing and cutting-edge concepts in digital marketingData-driven and results-oriented ‚Äì you love both spreadsheets and creative ideasA natural leader, you are comfortable in a dynamic and collaborative environmentExperienced in creating engaging campaigns and generating leadsStrong understanding of the French digital marketProven ability to lead multi-channel marketing strategies (performance, content, CRM, social, offline, and brand activations).Strong analytical mindset, able to connect marketing activities to lead generation and revenue impact.Experience in high-growth, competitive industries (e.g., travel, education, consumer services).Deep understanding of the French media landscape, including digital, influencer marketing, and traditional media.Fully fluent in French, used daily in the officeFully Fluent in English, required for global meetings

What EF offers: 

Work in the heart of Paris Opportunities to travel internationallyDiscounts on EF programs for Staff and Staff Friends and FamilyFree use of EF Hello: a premium Language Learning AppTuition Reimbursement for continued EducationBe part of a mission-driven company that transforms lives through educationTeam events, kick-offs, and Holiday Parties

At EF Language Abroad we are dedicated to our mission of opening the world through education, harnessing the power of language learning to deepen the connection between people across the globe.

Ready to open the world through education? Apply now!

About EF Education First

Openness to the world and cultural understanding are key qualities for a successful journey. Since 1965, we have helped millions of learners travel, discover new cultures, and live unique experiences.

Our immersive educational programs‚Äîfocused on languages, travel, cultural exchange, and academic learning‚Äîturn dreams into international opportunities.

By joining EF, you become part of a multicultural community active in over 50 countries, with hundreds of schools and offices worldwide. Our mission is to open the world through education. No matter your background or passions, we welcome you and hope you will share this vision with us.

EF is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer, committed to inclusion and belonging, regardless of origin, gender, age, religion, parental status, identity, or experience.

Founded in Sweden in 1965, EF has schools and offices around the world, with regional headquarters in Boston, London, S√£o Paulo, Tokyo, Zurich, and more.

EF is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children, young people and vulnerable adults. All positions are subject to criminal background and/or reference checks, as applicable.

enhanced_info.title: Assistant.e Marketing - Alternance (H/F)
enhanced_info.description:
Job Description

Join ADI Global Distribution, an innovative player in the distribution of security solutions. Our mission: Accelerate our commercial growth in France by boosting sales through the e-commerce channel, thanks to a smooth and engaging digital customer experience. Based in Alfortville, we are looking for a student in their 4th or 5th year of business school (Bac+4/5) for an alternance contract.

We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Marketing Assistant to join our team.

The ideal candidate will play a key role in increasing our existing online sales, improving customer adoption, and optimizing our quote-to-conversion rate.

This position requires a proactive individual with a strong commercial mindset and a good understanding of customer segmentation.

Job Duties

Contribute to the development of the e-shop‚Äôs commercial strategy (campaigns, promotional planning)Write SEO-optimized product descriptions, create email campaigns, and optimize performance using Google AnalyticsConduct digital prospecting: lead scraping, qualification, and follow-upReport on performance metricsTake a proactive approach: follow up with certain clients to assist them in creating their profilesIncrease existing online sales through targeted marketing strategiesImprove customer adoption by developing and implementing effective onboarding processesEnhance quote conversion rates by analyzing and optimizing sales processesConduct market research to identify new opportunities and trendsSegment customers to tailor marketing efforts and boost engagementCall potential and new clients to help them create accountsSupport new clients during their first experience by helping them place their first order

YOU MUST HAVE

Currently pursuing a Bac+3/4 degree in business school or equivalentExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsStrong analytical skills and ability to interpret data for decision-making

WE VALUE

Proficiency in Excel, GA4, CMS (e.g., Prestashop) is a plusDynamic, detail-oriented, proactiveAbility to work independently and as part of a teamEnjoys challenges and direct customer interaction

What's In It For You

12-month work-study contract, ideally from September to August, for a long-term and progressive immersionDual mentorship in marketing & e-commerceGlobal environment and growing market: join an international company, a leader in a promising sector, offering visibility and growth opportunitiesAttractive benefits from day one: meal vouchers and comprehensive health insuranceA professional development environment: collaborative atmosphere, continuous training, and active participation in strategic projects

About Us

Resideo is a $6.76 billion global manufacturer, developer, and distributor of technology-driven sensing and control solutions that help homeowners and businesses stay connected and in control of their comfort, security, energy use, and smart living. We focus on the professional channel, serving over 100,000 contractors, installers, dealers, and integrators across the HVAC, security, fire, electrical, and home comfort markets. Our products are found in more than 150 million residential and commercial spaces worldwide, with tens of millions of new devices sold annually. Trusted brands like Honeywell Home, First Alert, and Resideo power connected living for over 12.8 million customers through our Products & Solutions segment. Our ADI | Snap One segment spans 200+ stocking locations in 17 countries, offering a catalog of over 500,000 products from more than 1,000 manufacturers. With a global team of more than 14,000 employees, we offer the opportunity to make a real impact in a fast-growing, purpose-driven industry. Learn more at www.resideo.com .

At Resideo, we bring together diverse individuals to build the future of homes. Resideo is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status. For more information on applicable U.S. equal employment regulations, refer to the "EEO is the Law" poster , "EEO is the Law" Supplement Poster and the Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision . Resideo complies with applicable equal employment laws in all countries where we do business. For more information on how we process your information in the job application process, please refer to Recruitment Privacy Notice . If you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job, please use Contact Us form for assistance.

Gemmyo est la marque de joaillerie moderne cr√©√©e en 2011 par Pauline Laigneau et Charif Debs.

Gemmyo est une marque r√©f√©rente pour les Fran√ßais. R√©alis√©es dans des ateliers en France qui fa√ßonnent pour la Place Vend√¥me, les pi√®ces Gemmyo sont distribu√©es via le site internet de la marque et ses 9 boutiques (Paris 6, Paris 17, Lyon, Toulouse, Bordeaux, Aix-en-Provence, Bruxelles, Gen√®ve et Tokyo) selon un business model, unique sur le march√©, de fabrication √† la commande.
La marque conna√Æt actuellement un fort d√©veloppement : actuellement constitu√©e d‚Äôenviron 80 collaborateurs, la marque vise √† d√©ployer son empreinte dans les grandes capitales europ√©ennes et internationales dans les ann√©es √† venir.
Vos missions
Contexte de recrutement
L‚Äôentreprise est autofinanc√©e et rentable depuis 2019. enhanced_info.title: Lead User Acquisition Manager - Gaming
enhanced_info.description:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our Growth team is a transversal entity aiming to maximize and deliver the potential of any mobile product. It combines user acquisition, creative content production, monetization, and the tech capabilities required to turn applications into global hits. With over 150 experts, we operate at the forefront of mobile marketing and ad tech across various types of games (hypercasual, hybrid, 100% IAP).

Role

Build and grow your dream teamRecruit outstanding UA talent and help them thrive.Coach underperformers and make tough calls when necessary.Create a performance-driven, collaborative team culture.
Lead UA strategy across multiple game launches

Define tunnel-wide growth strategies for your entire gaming portfolio.Partner with studios to align on targets, timings, and tactics.Own flawless execution‚Äîyour team delivers, no matter what.

Personally manage our top-performing games

Take direct ownership of UA for some of our highest-priority titles.Set the standard for strategy, execution, and performance within the team.Lead by example through hands-on campaign management and optimization.

Boost performance, every day

Dive into campaign data to identify opportunities and signals.Increase ROAS across channels through creative iteration and data insights.Set up clear forecasting, pacing, and growth reporting.

Collaborate to unlock growth multipliers

Partner closely with studios, product managers, creative strategists, data scientists and more.Shape product decisions through a growth lens.Test bold ideas and deploy innovative UA tactics across the portfolio.

Shape the tools that power our growth

Use our in-house UA automation systems.

Provide structured feedback to stakeholders in order to continuously improve performance.

Be a thought leader

Share UA insights and growth innovations across the org.Mentor peers and contribute to a learning culture.Drive cross-functional initiatives that raise the bar for growth excellence.

Profile

Battle-tested in mobile gaming UA5+ years in performance marketing / UA, with real impact on high-scale mobile games.Proven leadership experienceYou've led and grown high-performing teams and know how to spot (and coach) top talent.Paid acquisition expertMastery of major UA platforms: Meta, TikTok, Applovin, AdMob, DSPs‚Ä¶Deep understanding of MMPs (Appsflyer, Adjust), SKAN, and attribution dynamics.Analytical & creative problem-solverComfortable navigating spreadsheets, statistical tools, and creative testing frameworks.You know when to trust your gut‚Äîand when to trust the data.Experimentation mindsetYou think in test plans and incremental wins.You structure learning loops that scale.Entrepreneurial and adaptableThrive in a fast-paced, ambitious environment.You get things done and keep pushing the frontier.Excellent communicator and collaboratorYou drive alignment across disciplines and keep people inspired.Fluent in English (French is a plus, but not a must.)
Benefits

Competitive salary based on experienceSwile Lunch voucherGymlib (100% covered by Voodoo)Premium healthcare coverage with SideCare, 100% covered for you and your familyWellness activities in our Paris officeRemote days on Fridays

enhanced_info.title: Head of Growth - BeReal
enhanced_info.description:
About BeReal

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 70+ and have 40M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

Role

As Head of Growth - you will be responsible for scaling BeReal worldwide, reporting to the CEO and working closely with Voodoo‚Äôs central growth team.

You will build and lead a team of 5+ people to cover all growth activities. The ideal candidate is a data-driven leader with a structured mindset, a passion for growth, and the ability to thrive in a dynamic and entrepreneurial environment.

Build the growth strategy to scale BeReal‚Äôs user base. Drive the execution of all user acquisition channels (including paid UA, product-led growth, offline activities, partnerships, PR, content production, influencer marketing, organic growth, community management, ASO and app store relationships.) Partner with cross-functional teams and product teams to ensure execution of the growth strategy and leverage resources effectivelyConduct systematic data analysis and leverage key metrics to measure channels performances, drive decision-making, prioritize growth initiatives and new opportunities.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitors‚Äô growth strategies to identify innovative activations

Profile

You have at least 5-8 years of experience, and a proven track record in driving growth for consumer-facing digital product, preferably in social media or mobile appsYou already have leadership experiences with the ability to inspire and manage a team of 5+ peopleYou understand the mobile growth ecosystem in detail as well as branding performance You are a data-driven, growth hacker with an entrepreneurial mindset and can adapt to a high-paced environmentYou can demonstrate excellent teamwork and collaboration skillsYou are fluent in English (fluency in French is a plus)

Benefits

Competitive salary upon experienceSwile Lunch voucherGymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family 100% borne by VoodooWellness activities in our Paris office

enhanced_info.title: Lead Creative Manager - Gaming
enhanced_info.description:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our Growth team helps maximize the potential of each Voodoo product within the ecosystem. Our Growth team is split into several job expertise such as user acquisition, ad monetization, video ads, playable ads, and influencer marketers. Being part of the Growth Team at Voodoo requires a lot of operational excellence and creativity in order to constantly adapt ourselves to stay ahead of the rest of the market.

Role

Voodoo is looking for a Lead Creative Manager to lead a squad of creative operators. You will own creative production for a large scope of our games or apps and play a central role in helping Voodoo turn great mobile products into global hits.

Prioritize and drive creative production for multiple games based on product and user acquisition strategyAnalyze your team‚Äôs performance, define action plans, and hit your KPIsLead up to 6 people: recruit, coach, and increase talent densityDiscover new creative concepts, and share best practices with other creative teamsLead key projects to test new tools, improve processes, etc.

Profile

You have 6+ years of experience in creative performance marketing, in the gaming and/or mobile apps industryYou have an extensive track record of managing a team in a creative fieldYou‚Äôve successfully led high-impact projectsYou speak and write English fluentlyYou wish to work in an environment that values candor, freedom, and responsibility

Benefits

Competitive salary Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by VoodooSwile Lunch voucherGymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)Wellness activities in our Paris officeFlexible vacation policyRemote daysChild daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

enhanced_info.description:
L'entreprise

Des formations denses, o√π chaque mot est pes√©,Des formateurs reconnus ;Une plateforme d‚Äôapprentissage cod√©e-maison, facile d‚Äôutilisation ;Un apprentissage souple, sans contraintes ;Un support apprenants aux petits soins.

Walter Learning a commenc√© √† commercialiser son produit en mai 2019. Depuis, l‚Äôentreprise a d√©montr√© une croissance tr√®s forte, sur un march√© gigantesque, puisqu'elle a vendu plus de 110 000 formations √† fin 2024. Walter Learning est autofinanc√©e et rentable.

Descriptif de l'√©quipe et du poste

Notre √©quipe Tech con√ßoit et am√©liore en continu notre plateforme d‚Äôapprentissage, nos outils de production, et nos outils m√©tiers internes. Nous recherchons aujourd‚Äôhui une D√©veloppeurse Fullstack exp√©riment√©e, capable d‚Äôallier expertise technique, compr√©hension fine des besoins m√©tiers et ma√Ætrise des outils d‚ÄôIA g√©n√©rative pour acc√©l√©rer et fiabiliser le d√©veloppement logiciel.

Vous rejoindrez une √©quipe orient√©e business, sous la responsabilit√© directe du CTO, dans une organisation √† taille humaine o√π l‚Äôimpact de chaque d√©veloppeurse est visible et valoris√©.

Missions Principales

Concevoir, d√©velopper et maintenir des applications robustes, scalables et s√©curis√©es (frontend & backend);Produire du code bien con√ßu, testable et efficace en utilisant les meilleures pratiques de d√©veloppement web;√ätre garante de la qualit√© du code (tests, relecture, bonnes pratiques, documentation), que ce soit produit manuellement ou via IA;Participer au recueil des besoins m√©tiers, √† la d√©finition des solutions techniques et √† la priorisation des t√¢ches;Cr√©er la mise en page du site Web / l'interface utilisateur en utilisant les pratiques HTML / CSS standard ainsi que les frameworks frontend connus

Int√©grer les donn√©es de divers services back-end et bases de donn√©es;

Recueillir et affiner les sp√©cifications et les exigences en fonction des besoins m√©tiers et contraintes techniques;Cr√©er et maintenir la documentation des projets;R√©aliser la maintenance des projets et pr√©voir leur mise √† l'√©chelle;Assister le support client sur toutes les questions relatives aux projets port√©s par le d√©partement technique, notamment la plateforme d‚Äôapprentissage;Assurer une veille technologique et IA pour proposer des am√©liorations pertinentes;Coop√©rer avec l‚Äô√©quipe Design pour correspondre √† l'intention de conception visuelle;Coop√©rer avec les √©quipes SEO et SEA.

Le poste est √† pourvoir √† Paris (75002) et en pr√©sentiel.

Profil recherch√©

Vous justifiez de 4 ans d'exp√©rience ou plus en d√©veloppement web, avec un focus sur des architectures modernes et scalables.Vous comprenez les enjeux m√©tiers et savez dialoguer avec les √©quipes Produit et Op√©rations.Vous √™tes √† l‚Äôaise avec les outils d‚ÄôIA g√©n√©rative pour assister le d√©veloppement, tout en assurant un contr√¥le rigoureux de la qualit√©, de la performance et de la s√©curit√© du code produit.Vous √™tes autonome, rigoureuxse, proactifve, et √† l‚Äô√©coute, capable de faire monter l‚Äô√©quipe en comp√©tences.

Comp√©tences Techniques Attendues

Programmation web, autant frontend (React/NextJS) que backend (Python, Django, SQL, NodeJS, GraphQL) Solide compr√©hension du fonctionnement des applications Web Connaissance des modes de d√©ploiements (Docker, Lambda) 

Comp√©tences Transverses

Orientation produit / business : comprendre les enjeux, proposer des solutions pertinentesExigence technique et autonomie Capacit√© √† √©valuer et am√©liorer la qualit√© de code, y compris g√©n√©r√© par des IAEsprit d‚Äô√©quipe, entraide, bienveillanceCulture de la documentation et du partage de savoirCuriosit√© technologique, notamment sur les usages d‚ÄôIA dans le d√©veloppement

enhanced_info.title: General Manager, Francophone Africa
enhanced_info.description:
Our Mission

Reduce inequity by helping immigrants move money home, and become the leading cross-border fintech for emerging markets.

The Team

> Founded by Harvard grads / 3rd-time founders --- also founded Segovia (successful exit) and GiveDirectly (>300M revenue, fastest-growing NGO).> Top performers from top and varied organizations (e.g., Bain, Bolt, Google, McKinsey, SafeBoda, Uber, Zipline) --- we like moving fast, and we hire people that do as well.> Driven by mission, guided by values (see below) ‚Äì in deed, not just word.> Team as global as the mission, >30 languages from 25 countries (i.e., if you‚Äôre interested in learning to make Chicken Moambe, we‚Äôre the place).

About Us

Taptap Send is backed by top VCs (Spark, Canaan, Reid Hoffman, Breyer Capital, etc.), rapidly growing and a great place for those looking for both impact and a fast-paced tech startup environment. Read more about the journey in Reid Hoffman‚Äôs words or TechCrunch article

Launched in 2019, Taptap is tapping into a transformative shift in global finance: from banks to phones. While this has affected wealthier countries as well, it has been nothing short of a revolution for the emerging markets where the overwhelming majority of population had been unable to access digital finance previously. Taptap Send allows immigrants to send money home instantly and with no fee*, saving money in the process. With a formal market size of >700B alone, we‚Äôve got a lot more saving to do for our users. Our mission is to reduce inequity by helping immigrants move money home, and become the leading cross-border fintech for emerging markets. And that‚Äôs just the beginning...

We charge fees for transfers on fixed exchange rate corridors (e.g., XOF, XAF).

Our Investors

Spark Capital, Canaan, Reid Hoffman, Breyer Capital (Jim Breyer), Unbound (Shravin Mittal), Wamda (Fadi Ghandour), Firstminute Capital, Slow Ventures (Sam Lessin), Helios Partners (Souleymane Ba), Crossbeam Ventures (Ali Hamed), Nikesh Arora, Samih Toukan, and many other context-specific angels

As the Head of Francophone Africa, your role will be to develop and scale Taptap Send‚Äôs supply side partnerships in Francophone Africa and grow our userbase. You will be excited to manage every aspect of growth in said markets: customer acquisition and retention strategy, pricing, user research, product quality, customer experience, team development and coaching. You will have an acute ‚Äúown it‚Äù mindset, equally obsessed with the experience of individual users as with iterating and optimizing scalable growth tactics and processes.

You will have P&L ownership, delivering the growth and profitability targets for the Francophone Africa market. You will seek to establish TTS as the leading product/service for sending remittances to Francophone Africa, whilst being the ‚Äúface‚Äù of Francophone Africa both internally and externally. Reporting directly into our Chief Commercial Officer, and building and leading a team of growth managers on the ground in sending markets, the role offers the chance to join an early-stage, high growth startup and to have a positive impact on the communities we serve.

Responsibilities

Establish a vision, strategy and execution plan for launching and scaling sending and receiving markets across Francophone Africa.Lead the team on the ground to execute within collaboratively aligned timelinesManage every aspect of growth across the sending countries: customer acquisition and retention strategy, pricing, user research, product quality, customer experience, team development and coachingReport to the executive leadership team on progress, insights and needs, leveraging operational prowess with a data-driven test-and-learn mindsetThink creatively on ways to unlock growth, improve profitability and increase brand awarenessHire, inspire, develop and retain top, diverse talentCollaborate closely with both internal and external stakeholders including the Customer Service, Finance, Tech, Legal, Financial Crime, Compliance, People Ops and moreBuild trust-based relationships with diaspora communities and commercial partners in the Francophone Africa region to increase brand awareness and unlock growth and unit economics improvementsMonitor, understand, and interpret specific growth, operational, and financial metrics to improve executionRecommend improvements to product experience based on market, competitor and customer insights and feedback 

Requirements

Preference for Paris, Dakar, Abidjan or Casablanca baseAbility to travel internationally periodically and ad-hoc to meet customers, partners and team membersExceptional knowledge and networks in the the Francophone Africa diasporaAdvanced stakeholder management capabilityExperience building, developing, managing and leading teamsStrong analytical skills and ability to make data-driven decisions. Familiarity with pulling and presenting insights from data using Excel / Google suite. SQL, Python, R is a plus7 to 15 years experience in a fast paced and high growth-environment such as startups, operations, consulting, finance, or similarAn acute ‚Äúown it‚Äù mindset, equally obsessed with the experience of individual users as with iterating and optimizing scalable growth tactics and processesBachelors or Advanced degreeFluency in English and French

Also you are

Outgoing - you love speaking to people and enjoy building meaningful relationshipsExecution Oriented - we have an ‚Äòimpact first‚Äô philosophy and a lot to get done. You should be able to take an idea to implementationMission Oriented - you are passionate about working for a net positive organisation / tech for goodOrganised - you have a system for how you approach your work that can keep you on track in a scrappy startup environmentDriven - you thrive in a fast-paced, target oriented company

Taptap Values 

Impact first

Team next

Accept reality

Propose solutions

Win with grit

Be proactively candid, with yourself and others

Love the particular

Own it

Create positive energy

Maybe, even have fun

Taptap Send is an equal opportunity employer dedicated to building an inclusive and diverse workforce. All employment decisions are decided on the basis of qualifications, experience and business need. We strongly encourage applications who are members of underrepresented communities to apply.

If you require reasonable adjustments to be made during the recruitment process, please do not hesitate to let us know. Any information you provide us in this respect will only be used to accommodate your requirements.

Note: we recognize imposter syndrome is real - any candidate that does not perfectly fit every characteristic of this role is still strongly encouraged to apply.

enhanced_info.title: IP Customer Success Engineer
enhanced_info.description:
Job Description

At Nokia, our Customer Success Engineers (CSEs) are based right in the same country as our customers, so they're always close at hand to provide expert support. CSEs are true subject matter experts and are an essential piece of Nokia being able to provide top-tier Technical Support services. CSEs act as proactive advisors, offering recommendations and helping to implement customer-approved action plans. CSEs are responsible for quickly identifying and resolving any technical issues by working closely with our Constant Care Team. CSEs provide our customers with a dedicated, highly technical resource who the customer can rely on for all their technical support issues and needs. If you're passionate about helping customers and have a strong technical background, the CSE role might be the perfect fit for you!

How You Will Contribute And What You Will Learn

Leads a virtual team of L2/L3 technical experts (CCT or similar) using associated NI tool sets, acting as SPoC / SME for technical support activities affecting the customer‚Äôs network for NI products. The primary support interface for all TRs. Often located within the country to which the customer resides, acting as a key resource differentiator for NI Care Adv Svc Suite, acting as liaison (recommendations, implementation of customer approved action plan, etc.) & forensic specialist for products within the scope of the offer.Act as single point of contact between customer and NI Care for Maintenance technical issues (business hours ‚Äì CCT 24x7)Provide oversight and review of customer MOP pertaining to upgrades & retrofits, ensuring related communication towards the customer. Provide configuration assistance & consultancy expertise Implement customer approved action/correction plan. Responsible to make available in SharePoint, all materials or location specific details of the Buyer network.Facilitate identification of control mechanisms and critical action/recovery paths for system components. description.text:
Job Description

At Nokia, our Customer Success Engineers (CSEs) are based right in the same country as our customers, so they're always close at hand to provide expert support. CSEs are true subject matter experts and are an essential piece of Nokia being able to provide top-tier Technical Support services. CSEs act as proactive advisors, offering recommendations and helping to implement customer-approved action plans. CSEs are responsible for quickly identifying and resolving any technical issues by working closely with our Constant Care Team. CSEs provide our customers with a dedicated, highly technical resource who the customer can rely on for all their technical support issues and needs. If you're passionate about helping customers and have a strong technical background, the CSE role might be the perfect fit for you!

enhanced_info.title: AI Lead
enhanced_info.description:
üíª Job Title: AI Leadü§ë Salary: up to ~‚Ç¨200k (flex for the right candidate)üìà Equity: up to 0.5% (valued at $625k)üìç Location: fully remote anywhere in Europe (quarterly team get togethers)üîê Company: Cyber Security SaaS start-up building AI agents to identify and resolve cloud vulnerabilitiesüë• Team: ~20 (aiming for 35+ by year end)üí∏ Funding: $30m+ Series A
Are you looking for the next big thing and want to work on novel products? üöÄ
üëâ If you‚Äôve led AI research, built prototypes that turned into products and want to architect the future of intelligent security, this could be your defining role at a well-funded start-up, operating at the intersection of AI and cybersecurity.
We‚Äôre searching for an AI leader to set the vision, shape the research agenda and turn cutting-edge ideas into real-world impact. Working closely with the CTO, you'll own the end-to-end AI strategy, drive innovation with LLMs and agent systems, guide a growing team of top talent and translate research into breakthrough product capabilities that protect organisations worldwide.
This role is for someone who thrives at combining deep technical expertise with strategic leadership, and is eager to define the standards of how AI transforms security.
ü´µ What you'll do:Define the AI vision: Develop and own the long-term strategy for applying machine learning and generative models to solve complex security problems.Turn research into products: Build prototypes of new techniques, validate them and work with engineering to transform them into customer-facing features.Establish evaluation standards: Design systems and benchmarks that measure the performance of LLMs, agents and AI-driven workflows in real-world security contexts.Raise the technical bar: Provide architectural guidance, review implementations, and ensure quality across all AI-related initiatives.Build and grow the team: Hire, mentor and lead AI talent, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.
‚úÖ Must have requirements:Deep LLM, NLP, GenAI and Agentic AI expertise - you must have hands-on experience with modern transformer architectures, autonomous agent systems, fine-tuning techniques, evaluations and agent frameworksA track record of guiding teams and shaping AI direction at leading research labs, major tech companies or fast-moving startups (think DeepMind, OpenAI, Anthropic, Microsoft, Google or similar)Ability to move quickly from research phase to working prototypes to scalable production systems.Experience applying AI research to practical business challenges and measuring success through user and market impact.Strong engineering foundation with a software development background (ideally in Python) and the ability to design, review and critique complex architectures.Security consciousness - understanding of vulnerability management
üëç Bonus points for:Cybersecurity domain knowledge or experience applying AI to security challengesAdvanced academic credentials (PhD or equivalent) with publications in respected conferences/journals.Familiarity with AI safety, benchmarking, and responsible deployment practices.

enhanced_info.title: Head of Marketing
enhanced_info.description:
Quandela is a European scale up that provides photonic quantum computers that are modular, scalable, energy-efficient and accessible both on the cloud and on premise. Our team of 140 employees specialises in the development of both software and hardware solutions for a variety of quantum applications. We offer a wide range of services, from developing the most efficient and brightest single photons sources, to creating algorithms for quantum computers and providing cloud quantum computing solutions. Quandela plays a pivotal role as a strategic partner in the quantum transformation of industrial sectors such as energy, finance, pharmaceuticals, and transportation. Furthermore, we are esteemed collaborators within the academic and research community.  Following a successful ‚Ç¨50 million fundraising in 2023, we are now scaling up our commercial ventures alongside our ongoing research endeavors.  Quandela has been chosen to participate in the French Tech 2030 program, which aims to bolster French companies pioneering groundbreaking innovations.  
As a full-stack quantum computer manufacturer, we are rapidly scaling our international presence and product offerings. To support this growth, we are hiring a Head of Marketing with a strong scientific background and proven experience in marketing complex, technical products.This is a unique opportunity to shape the market positioning of a deep-tech scaleup at the forefront of the quantum revolution.You will be responsible for defining and executing Quandela's global marketing strategy, working at the intersection of product, communications, and sales. 
Your role will be instrumental in turning our technical excellence into market leadership.. You will work closely with the product department to ensure marketing strategies align with product development and roadmaps. Additionally, you will collaborate extensively with the head of corporate communication to maintain brand consistency and maximize communication impact across all channels. You will be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive marketing strategies that effectively communicate our quantum computing solutions to target markets, drive brand awareness, and support revenue growth objectives. Your technical background combined with marketing expertise will enable you to translate complex quantum technologies into compelling value propositions that resonate with diverse stakeholders. The position of Head of Marketing will rapidly evolve with the organization. 
Key Responsibilities  Strategic Leadership: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with company objectives and product roadmaps  Cross-functional Collaboration: Serve as the critical link between product development, communications, and sales teams to ensure consistent messaging and go-to-market strategies   Product Marketing: Work directly with the product department to translate technical specifications of our quantum products into clear value propositions for different industry segments and go-to-market strategies for our quantum computing solutions  Go-to-Market Execution: Lead product launches, sales enablement, messaging consistency, and cross-channel campaigns  Content Strategy: Collaborate with the head of corporate communication, research team, quantum applications teams and products teams to direct the creation of high-quality technical marketing materials, white papers, case studies, and digital content that effectively communicate our quantum computing solutions  Market Analysis: Lead research initiatives to identify market trends, competitive landscape, and customer needs in the quantum computing space  Brand Development: Partner with corporate communication to enhance Quandela's position as a thought leader in quantum computing through strategic communication initiatives and to formalize a global communication platform  Event Management: Oversee participation in industry conferences, technical exhibitions, and corporate events to showcase our quantum technology leadership  Channel Marketing: Develop strategies for partner ecosystem growth and enablement  Performance Measurement: Implement metrics and analytics to measure marketing effectiveness and ROI  Reporting: Provide regular updates to the Chief Growth Officer on marketing performance, strategy implementation, and market insights Team management: responsible for building and scaling a well-structured marketing team composed of both permanent staff (junior and senior profiles) and external partners (freelancers). Define resource needs, recruit the right talent, coordinate collaboration between internal and external contributors, and ensure a cohesive team dynamic aligned with the company's strategic objectives. 


Requirements

Required Your engineering background (Physics, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related technical field) will be imperative to deeply understand Quandela's sophisticated quantum technologies and to conceive innovative, impactful marketing strategies that translate our technical excellence into market success.
Minimum 10+ years of progressive marketing experience, with at least 3 years in leadership roles. Early-career experience as a Product Manager or in a technical function within deep tech, cloud computing, AI, or HPC environments Proven experience in technology marketing, particularly in deep tech, high-performance computing or cloud computing, or related fields.  Proven ability to build and execute marketing strategies for complex, full-stack technical products  Excellent communication skills with the ability to translate complex technical concepts into compelling messaging  Strong project management skills with experience leading cross-functional teams  Data-driven approach to marketing with experience in AI project management, analytics and performance measurement Led a successful initiative to embed AI into marketing operations: launching AI-powered campaigns, automating workflows, or driving smarter targeting through machine learning. Ability to turn innovation into results, and ready to bring that mindset to our next stage of growth.  Preferred Knowledge of B2B marketing in enterprise technology environments Understanding of scientific and research communities' needs and communication preferences International marketing experience Familiarity with the European technology ecosystem 
 Personal Attributes  Strategic thinker with strong business acumen  Comfortable working closely with engineering, research, and product teams to translate technical insights into clear, value-driven messaging Excellent communicator with a talent for simplifying scientific concepts and engaging diverse stakeholders (technical, business, and institutional)Creative problem-solver with a passion for emerging technologies Collaborative leader who excels in cross-functional environments Self-motivated with a hands-on approach and attention to detail Curious mind with enthusiasm for quantum computing and its applications 


Benefits

 Flexible hours and remote working  Profit-sharing and a company savings plan Annual sustainable mobility bonus for eco-friendly transport (e-bike, e-scooter, electric car) Fully covered health insurance (Alan) Referral program  Meal subsidies (Swile)  
If you're driven by challenge and inspired by the future of quantum computing, let's talk.

enhanced_info.description:

This job offer is accessible to all, regardless of gender.

Job title: Product Owner

Location: Lyon

About The Job

At Sanofi, we‚Äôre committed to transform the practice of medicine through break-through science. Within Sanofi, Manufacturing & Supply (M&S) is the bridge between Science and Patients, ensuring all patients get their dose reliably, that new medicines are launched faster to cover unmet needs and that they can be delivered affordably across the globe. At Sanofi we are convinced that Manufacturing is, and must in the future increasingly be, a competitive advantage and that digital unlocks every next step in that journey. Join our Digital M&S Accelerator team as Product Owner and you can help make it happen.

Your job? As a Product Owner, you will be a senior leader and act as a mini-CEO for digital products, co-defining product strategy with M&S leadership, planning product roadmap, driving product delivery with delivery teams, and measuring/optimizing business impact.

Sanofi Manufacturing & Supply is the most extraordinary playground you can imagine. The world of drug development and advanced manufacturing with opportunities for real-world AI is one of the most fascinating places to be in digital today and biomanufacturing puts an additional twist of challenge working with biological living processes and saving people‚Äôs lives.

You will deliver capabilities to our 40 factories spread across five continents. You will work with real-time IOT data from hundreds of manufacturing lines with leading edge production and laboratory equipment. You will help secure one of the strongest new treatment pipelines in the biopharma industry. And you will serve thousands of extraordinary scientists, process engineers, manufacturing engineers, manufacturing operators and quality experts who are convinced that digital is the path to become a best-in-class organization.

We have established the Digital M&S Accelerator as a dedicated agile organization to deliver High Value Digital Products focused primarily on accelerating launches and creating best in class digitalized factories we call Lighthouses. The ambition is first to secure the pipeline of new treatment launches, successfully launching yearly 3 to 5 new blockbuster medicines (peak yearly revenue of 1 billion euros) where delays have multi-million euros impact and second to deliver manufacturing performance driving cost of goods reduction of more than 500 million euros over the next five years.

We are an innovative global healthcare company with one purpose: to chase the miracles of science to improve people‚Äôs lives. We‚Äôre also a company where you can flourish and grow your career, with countless opportunities to explore, make connections with people, and stretch the limits of what you thought was possible. Ready to get started?

About Growing With Us

In this role you will‚ÄØown and deliver new innovative Digital Products. You will be empowered to build digital capabilities that disrupt current manufacturing and new medicine launch practices. You will be expected not just to enable but to modernize, automate or eliminate activities not creating value by leveraging digital, data and AI technologies:

Own products from a "What", "Why" and ‚ÄúOutcome‚Äù perspective Define, create, and communicate products roadmap aligned with business priorities and supported by business cases, shopfloor research and competitive analysis Manage product delivery and documentation, ensuring requirements collection, process and solution documentation, and solution development meet defined milestones Deliver products that are easy to adopt and use, contribute to roll-out across factories or launch teams and constantly monitor and improve usage and user satisfaction Manage backlog prioritization of work and be accountable for delivering incremental value every sprint while ensuring enough focus is put on experimenting breakthrough ideas Work with Scrum Master and delivery team daily, clarifying context and expectations, addressing ambiguities, being available to solve issues Inspire the team, raise the ambition and bring a unique vision and perspective for what is possible

Experience

About you

Product management or building complex digital solutions, preferably with experience in manufacturing or industrial development Experience in a biopharma or biotech company is a strong plus Experience with Agile and Digital transformation in complex, international environments 

Soft Skills

Strong drive and ability to build & share product vision Excellent communication & presenting skills, including with executive stakeholdersProven business sense, ability to take decisions, think strategically and partner with business/other teams Structured, organized, and capable of managing multiple topics and prioritiesTrack-record of problem-solving & overcoming roadblocks in a complex environment Strong cross-functional leadership & influencing skillsCuriosity, creativity, sense of detail, first principles and ‚Äúget things done‚Äù mindset 

Technical Skills

Solid knowledge of Lean or Agile practices, User Experience & Application Design 

Education

Master‚Äôs degree in computer science or equivalent scientific field, with 5+ years of experience in product management, preferably in healthcare or biotech

Why choose us?

We Provide a Highly Open And Collaborative Environment, With An Opportunity To Work With a World Class Team. You Will Be Able To

Learn what it takes to make a service with a truly global reach Be part of an organization that values diversity, inclusion, and the richness of different backgrounds and experiencesEngage in meaningful work that combines the challenges of pharma, manufacturing, environmental matters and technical fields, offering abundant opportunities for professional growth and impactContribute to a company that is not only a leader in healthcare but also a pioneer in digital transformation, shaping the future of global health

Pursue Progress. Discover Extraordinary.

Progress doesn‚Äôt happen without people ‚Äì people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing: a desire to make miracles happen. You can be one of those people. Chasing change, embracing new ideas and exploring all the opportunities we have to offer. Let‚Äôs pursue progress. And let‚Äôs discover extraordinary together.

At Sanofi, we provide equal opportunities to all regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity.

Watch our ALL IN video and check out our Diversity Equity and Inclusion actions at sanofi.com!

Rejoignez Sanofi et entrez dans une nouvelle √®re de la science ‚Äì o√π votre parcours peut √™tre aussi transformateur que le travail que nous accomplissons. Nous investissons en vous pour que vous alliez plus loin, acc√©l√©riez votre r√©flexion et accomplissiez ce qui n‚Äôa jamais √©t√© fait auparavant. We have established the Digital M&S Accelerator as a dedicated agile organization to deliver High Value Digital Products focused primarily on accelerating launches and creating best in class digitalized factories we call Lighthouses. The ambition is first to secure the pipeline of new treatment launches, successfully launching yearly 3 to 5 new blockbuster medicines (peak yearly revenue of 1 billion euros) where delays have multi-million euros impact and second to deliver manufacturing performance driving cost of goods reduction of more than 500 million euros over the next five years.

We are an innovative global healthcare company with one purpose: to chase the miracles of science to improve people‚Äôs lives. We‚Äôre also a company where you can flourish and grow your career, with countless opportunities to explore, make connections with people, and stretch the limits of what you thought was possible. Ready to get started?

About Growing With Us

In this role you will‚ÄØown and deliver new innovative Digital Products. You will be empowered to build digital capabilities that disrupt current manufacturing and new medicine launch practices. You will be expected not just to enable but to modernize, automate or eliminate activities not creating value by leveraging digital, data and AI technologies:

Own products from a "What", "Why" and ‚ÄúOutcome‚Äù perspective Define, create, and communicate products roadmap aligned with business priorities and supported by business cases, shopfloor research and competitive analysis Manage product delivery and documentation, ensuring requirements collection, process and solution documentation, and solution development meet defined milestones Deliver products that are easy to adopt and use, contribute to roll-out across factories or launch teams and constantly monitor and improve usage and user satisfaction Manage backlog prioritization of work and be accountable for delivering incremental value every sprint while ensuring enough focus is put on experimenting breakthrough ideas Work with Scrum Master and delivery team daily, clarifying context and expectations, addressing ambiguities, being available to solve issues Inspire the team, raise the ambition and bring a unique vision and perspective for what is possible

Experience

About you

Product management or building complex digital solutions, preferably with experience in manufacturing or industrial development Experience in a biopharma or biotech company is a strong plus Experience with Agile and Digital transformation in complex, international environments 

Soft Skills

Strong drive and ability to build & share product vision Excellent communication & presenting skills, including with executive stakeholdersProven business sense, ability to take decisions, think strategically and partner with business/other teams Structured, organized, and capable of managing multiple topics and prioritiesTrack-record of problem-solving & overcoming roadblocks in a complex environment Strong cross-functional leadership & influencing skillsCuriosity, creativity, sense of detail, first principles and ‚Äúget things done‚Äù mindset 

Technical Skills

Solid knowledge of Lean or Agile practices, User Experience & Application Design 

Education

Master‚Äôs degree in computer science or equivalent scientific field, with 5+ years of experience in product management, preferably in healthcare or biotech

Why choose us?

We Provide a Highly Open And Collaborative Environment, With An Opportunity To Work With a World Class Team. You Will Be Able To

Learn what it takes to make a service with a truly global reach Be part of an organization that values diversity, inclusion, and the richness of different backgrounds and experiencesEngage in meaningful work that combines the challenges of pharma, manufacturing, environmental matters and technical fields, offering abundant opportunities for professional growth and impactContribute to a company that is not only a leader in healthcare but also a pioneer in digital transformation, shaping the future of global health

Pursue Progress. Discover Extraordinary.

Progress doesn‚Äôt happen without people ‚Äì people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing: a desire to make miracles happen. You can be one of those people. Chasing change, embracing new ideas and exploring all the opportunities we have to offer. Let‚Äôs pursue progress. And let‚Äôs discover extraordinary together.

At Sanofi, we provide equal opportunities to all regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity.

Watch our ALL IN video and check out our Diversity Equity and Inclusion actions at sanofi.com!

En nous rejoignant, vous int√©grez un collectif qui valorise la diversit√©, d√©veloppe le potentiel de ses talents, s‚Äôengage dans des initiatives solidaires avec ses partenaires, et se mobilise pour r√©duire son impact environnemental sur tous ses sites et aupr√®s de ses clients.

enhanced_info.title: Global Online & Strategy Manager
enhanced_info.description:
Amex GBT is a place where colleagues find inspiration in travel as a force for good and ‚Äì through their work ‚Äì can make an impact on our industry. We‚Äôre here to help our colleagues achieve success and offer an inclusive and collaborative culture where your voice is valued.

Global Online Strategy and Maintenance Manager

The Global Online Strategy Manager provides insight and support for all online solutions to the account management team and Schneider Electric travel leaders to enable effective interface of online tools with enterprise associates, efficient implementation of new features & releases, and realization of savings goals.

Skills:

Strong Concur environment knowledge and expertiseStrong understanding of global travel online operations, suppliers, and systemsHighly developed Project & Change management skills.Strong analytical thinker combined with written and verbal communication skills.Proven experience relating to the creation and delivery of business process strategies for large global clients.Demonstrated ability to work successfully across cultures and regions and the ability to work with cross-functional teams and to influence both internally and externally.Confident approach to presentations, client & internal meetings.Strong PC knowledge including related PowerPoint/Excel/ Microsoft Project/Email skills. In depth understanding of drivers for customer satisfaction in the business travel industry.


The Global Online Strategy manager will:

Global Strategy & Project Manager:Responsible Global Online life cycle: innovative leader, strategic thinker with a focus on program optimizationsupport the client, client management and customer‚Äôs contacts on a day-to-day basisLead the SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC Global travel programResponsible for driving innovative travel strategy balancing operational efficiency with a high touch service for the traveller experience.Develop Global & regional online adoption targets and market strategies for an intuitive online booking experience: Train, Monitor program status and savingsDevelop strategy plans, leader for customer expansion, future markets or technology implementation.Handle multiple priorities and deliver to often tight timeframes.Lead SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC Travel expansion, foresee markets implementations, expansion and technical sites optimization & site maintenance.Ensure the business requirements are aligned with global strategic objectives of both Amex GBT/partner and SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC.Special projects management: e.g. support SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC with new acquisitions and strategy.Online site reviews ‚Äì Technical support to improve adoption levels including additional `new` functionalitylarge maintenance projects:Amex GBT Pre-Release ‚Äì Testing and Post Release - Site updatesConcur Pre-Release ‚Äì Testing and Post Release - Site updatesCSAT/Verbatim: analysis, solutions, recommendations shared

Implementation & Deployment manager Interact and support client in special projects and day-to-day requests such as Policy Exception management, crisis managementSupports Client and Client Management team leveraging project management,Implementation & deployment of Manage the Online tool roll out according to the project plan.Lead Concur Travel implementation programming & expansion of Concur Travel in new markets. Global Online Site Administrator, Support and Maintenance ManagerGlobal Site administrator on the Concur online booking tool. Implements vendor (air, rental car, hotel, etc.) agreements and monitors compliance with reporting, tracking data, knowledge on opportunities/challenges with performances of goals, etc. Client Travel Policy ‚Äì Maintain the master list of Client travel policies. Ensure that Operations is notified of any changes and updates to the policies in OBTAirline, Car, Rail, Ground and Hotel Contracts ‚Äì Maintain the vendor contracts in OBT + maintain Policy Rules & Messages Hotel:Handle the administrative aspects of the Hotel RFP. Hotel Maintenance: Load in OBT Preferred Properties, Preferred chains, Hotel Rate caps, Hotel policy Rules, Hotel messages Hotel policy Rules updates (Currency fluctuation)Bi-weekly Hotel calls: overview, action plans & milestones.AIR:Preferred airlines OBT upload and maintenanceAir policy Rules updates (Currency fluctuation)Update: Airline safety ratingBi-weekly Air calls: overview, action plans & milestones.CAR:Preferred Car OBT upload and maintenanceCar policy Rules updates (Currency fluctuation)Client Issues2nd level Tech support: Issue resolution/Vendor escalations/Outage &/or Maintenance communicationResearch and respond to client issues. Or open Salesforce/SNAP tickets for the relevant dept to research. Key linkage with the travel team to secure access to all needed resources, products, services and support. Daily maintenance of the Concur Travel live sites (GBT/Concur updates, new functionality, enhancement)Second technical travel support- provide support to incoming requests/questions or concerns received from the customer, users, Travel GBT/TPN teamCreate/maintain Concur casesCreate/maintain Solution Suggestions in ConcurCollaborate w/ Concur for prioritizing SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC CasesTrack changes/updates/enhancement applied through SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC Market requirement documents (40) & Global SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC Concur documentCommunication maintenance:Elaboration and Maintenance Concur Profile GuidesElaboration and Maintenance Concur Travel Getting Started FAQ

Profile support:HR feed & profiles move from one country to another- manual action required in ConcurProfile synch issue at profile level or site levelConcur Profile master: TPN (Sabre Profile/GDS Profile synch) + GBT proprietary: Connect Profile & PE+ migration; 1GBT Standards & SBP (‚Ä¶)Transient GBT Profile share w/ M&E Concur US (BCD)Global Site administrator for Concur US M&E site held by BCD- Maintenance of US M&E/BCD sites.TEST/Bear V. & Never W. Profiles maintenance- SecuredSite Setup support & maintenance:Company Locations/monthlyRisk country/ monthlyTrainingConcur Travel Release/new featureCurrency conversion/fluctuation -Twice a yearConcur Travel sitesLead CIBT: maintenance of the Concur CIBT app: disconnect/Connect + CIBT messagesMessage creation & maintenance: Login Warning, Company Notes‚Ä¶

Location

The #TeamGBT Experience

Work and life: Find your happy medium at Amex GBT.

Flexible benefits are tailored to each country and start the day you do. These include health and welfare insurance plans, retirement programs, parental leave, adoption assistance, and wellbeing resources to support you and your immediate family.Travel perks: get a choice of deals each week from major travel providers on everything from flights to hotels to cruises and car rentals.Develop the skills you want when the time is right for you, with access to over 20,000 courses on our learning platform, leadership courses, and new job openings available to internal candidates first.We strive to champion Inclusion in every aspect of our business at Amex GBT. You can connect with colleagues through our global INclusion Groups, centered around common identities or initiatives, to discuss challenges, obstacles, achievements, and drive company awareness and action.And much more!


All applicants will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to age, sex, gender (and characteristics related to sex and gender), pregnancy (and related medical conditions), race, color, citizenship, religion, disability, or any other class or characteristic protected by law.

Global Online Strategy and Maintenance Manager

The Global Online Strategy Manager provides insight and support for all online solutions to the account management team and Schneider Electric travel leaders to enable effective interface of online tools with enterprise associates, efficient implementation of new features & releases, and realization of savings goals.

In depth understanding of drivers for customer satisfaction in the business travel industry.

enhanced_info.title: Product Marketing Manager
enhanced_info.description:
We provide the DevOps automation platform built to empower developers. From cloud infrastructure provisioning to production deployment, Qovery streamlines every step, enabling faster delivery, simplified workflows, and significant time savings.

ü§© Why is your role important?

As Qovery‚Äôs first Product Marketing Manager, you will lay the foundation for how our story is told to the world. You‚Äôll shape the way we position ourselves in a crowded DevOps and cloud market, crafting messaging that cuts through the noise and resonates with both developers and business buyers. This role is pivotal in giving clarity to our narrative, enabling the sales team, and helping our users understand the real value of choosing Qovery.

üöÄ What will your job look like

As our first Product Marketing Manager, you‚Äôll be both strategist and builder. Your mission will be to:

Define positioning and messaging that makes Qovery‚Äôs value clear to developers, platform teams, and business stakeholders. Enable our sales team with the right tools (battlecards, one-pagers, pitch decks) to communicate our story with clarity and impact. Shape our go-to-market strategy for new features and product launches, ensuring we stand out in a crowded DevOps/CloudOps market. Collaborate with Product and Engineering to translate complex technology into simple, compelling narratives. Lead market research and competitive analysis to keep us ahead of industry trends and sharpen our differentiation. Support demand generation with content and campaigns that attract and educate prospects. Embody Qovery‚Äôs Culture: Collaborate in a caring, transparent, and innovative environment, building authentic relationships with customers and colleagues.

This is a role for someone who thrives in an early-stage environment: you‚Äôll have freedom to experiment, influence strategy directly, and set the standards for Product Marketing at Qovery.

üí° About you

We‚Äôre looking for a Product Marketing Manager who is equal parts storyteller and strategist. Someone who can dive deep into our product, empathise with developers and platform teams, and translate technical complexity into messages that resonate.

Here‚Äôs What Will Help You Succeed

At least 5 years experience as a Product Marketing Manager in B2B SaaS in early-stage startups.Experience in DevOps, Cloud, Platform Engineering, or a technical developer-focused product. A builder‚Äôs mindset: you‚Äôve shaped Product Marketing in a growing company before, or you‚Äôre eager to take on that challenge for the first time. Strong communication skills: you can switch seamlessly between writing clear, concise copy and building narratives for executives, customers, and sales teams. Analytical and curious: you like to dig into customer insights, market research, and data to inform positioning and strategy. Collaborative by nature: you work well with Product, Engineering, Sales, and Marketing, and know how to bridge technical and commercial worlds. Hands-on and proactive: in a small team, you‚Äôre comfortable rolling up your sleeves and making things happen.

Most importantly, you share our values: ownership, transparency, and a developer-first mindset.

üéØ What You‚Äôll Get at Qovery

Competitive Compensation.Comprehensive Benefits.Flexible Work Setup: Remote-first culture; work from anywhere with a reliable internet connection.Learning Opportunities: Professional development and growth supported from day one.Innovative Environment: Join a high-growth startup pushing boundaries in cloud technology.Authentic Culture: Collaborate with a team that values care, innovation, and customer success.

üí• Our Talent Acquisition Process

We‚Äôve designed a streamlined process to ensure a great candidate experience. Typically, it takes 3-4 weeks:

Initial Call: Meet with Marie or Ludwig to discuss your experience, motivation, and career goals.Hiring Manager Interview: A 60-minute deep dive into your sales skills and collaboration experience.Workshop/Case Study PresentationFinal Round: Meet with a co-founder and leadership to discuss alignment with Qovery‚Äôs values and mission.Reference Checks: Validate performance, integrity, and alignment with our needs.

We‚Äôre committed to keeping you informed throughout the process, ensuring a smooth and transparent experience.

We are passionate about simplifying the complexities of cloud infrastructure for software development. We provide an Internal Developer Platform that streamlines the path to production, offering solutions like testing, ephemeral environments, and a focus on continuous software improvement.

As a growing company co-founded by experienced professionals, we are committed to innovation and excellence in the tech world.
